LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency.label: ефективність нічного бачення
LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency.description: A measure of the creature's overall ability to overcome the effects of darkness for the purpose of making ranged attacks based on apparel, implants, and their natural abilities.
LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency_Implant.label: ефективність імплантату нічного бачення
LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency_Implant.descriptio: The effect of artifical implants on a creature's ability to overcome the effects of darkness for the purpose of making ranged attacks.
LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency_Weapon.label: ефективність нічного бачення
LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency_Weapon.description: The effect of a weapon's optics on a the wielder's ability to overcome the effects of darkness for the purpose of firing accurately.
LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency_Apparel.label: ефективність нічного бачення
LanguageData.NightVisionEfficiency_Apparel.descriptio: The effect of apparel items on a creature's ability to overcome the effects of darkness for the purpose of making ranged attacks.
